flawed_nl_solution:
If the art piece was bought at $4000, and its price in three years will be three times its buying price, it will be worth 3*$4000 = $120000 in another three years.
The price of the art piece will increase by $120000-$4000 = $<<120000-4000=116000>>116000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 120000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
